mapper.insert: insert into reply (rno, bno, reply, id, REG_DATE) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{id}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update reply set reply = #{reply}, reg_date = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, id, reg_date, mod_date from reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno desc
